name: Hotel Management
desc: Built using C# and Windows Forms to develop hotel management software with features such as room booking, customer management, and payment processing.

name: Employee Management
desc: Built using ReactJS framework to create a user interface for employee management application, including features such as add, edit, delete, and search employees.

name: Unsupervised Learning Algorithms
desc: Applied unsupervised algorithms like K-means and Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) to cluster and classify text data, forecasting research trends.

name: Aptech Website
desc: Used ASP.NET MVC framework to clone an introductory website for Aptech, including pages like homepage, about, courses, and contact.
